item.description:
This is always a fun Meetup!  If you have ever wanted to get a reading or practice giving your own readings, this is the Meetup for you!  Bring your runes, cards, pendulums or whatever aids you with your readings if this is what you use.  Members of our Living in Your Heart class will also be there to give readings.  No worries if you do not think you can give a reading, you can still be on the receiving end several times!  There will be a short discussion about how readings work and then the fun begins. 

Please bring enough food for at least four people and be ready for a great time!

Remember, people come who are not members of this meetup, so there are more than appear on the RSVP count. 

Please e-mail me if you have questions.
item.how_to_find_us: come in on the upper porch
item.name: give a reading... get a reading!
